Feature.Name: Comforting Wind (Simple Property)
Feature.Text: While you are attuned to this rune, you cannot suffocate or drown, and you gain advantage on saving throws against poisonous gases, inhaled poisons, and similar effects.

Feature.Name: Wind Step (Simple Property)
Feature.Text: As an action, you scribe the vind rune in the air around you and immediately fly 20 feet. If you do not land at the end of this flight, you fall.

Feature.Name: Wind’s Grasp (Simple Property)
Feature.Text: As a reaction when you fall, you can scribe this rune in the air around you to take no damage from the fall.

Feature.Name: Howling Brand (Complex Property)
Feature.Text: Over the course of a short rest, you inscribe this rune in the air above one ranged weapon. The weapon gains a ghostly blue aura and has its normal and maximum range doubled. The weapon’s attacks do not suffer disadvantage due to range. In addition, you can expend a spell slot while using this property to grant the weapon a bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls equal to the spell slot’s level divided by three. These effects last for 24 hours or until you use this property again.

Feature.Name: Shrieking Bolt (Complex Property)
Feature.Text: As an action, you scribe this rune in the air between you and a creature you can see while you expend a spell slot. The creature must make a Strength saving throw (DC 12 + the spell slot’s level). On a failure, it takes 2d8 bludgeoning damage plus 1d8 bludgeoning damage per level of the expended spell slot, and is pushed in a straight line directly away from you for 10 feet per level of the expended spell slot. On a successful saving throw, the creature takes half as much damage and is not pushed away from you.

BonusSpellFeature.Name: Wind Walker (Complex Property)
BonusSpellFeature.Text: While you are attuned to this rune, you can cast levitate as a bonus action. You regain this ability after a short or long rest.

MagicProperty.Name: Pennant of the Vind Rune
MagicProperty.Description: This five-foot-long blue pennant is crafted from silk and whips about as if buffeted by a strong breeze. The vind rune—the rune of wind—flickers across its surface like a shimmering cloud. Grasping the pennant causes you to feel a powerful gust of wind wash over you, tearing at your clothes and gear. Anyone watching you sees nothing out of the ordinary, and the sensation passes after a moment.
MagicProperty.Source: Unearthed Arcana 9 - Prestige Classes and Rune Magic
